feed.title: Syncthing Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Syncthing: v1.27.5
entry.content:
Bugfixes:

  • 9371: Deleting or renaming directories when syncing xattrs or ownership causes empty dir tree to get "put back" by ST

  • 9407: IndexHandler can get stuck in an undesired loop

  • 9417: CPU usage increases after folder scans (and hence, over time)

  • 9469: Better wrapping for device and folder names in sharing lists

Enhancements:

  • 8972: Open share settings when clicking 'shared with'

  • 9470: Show encryption status for devices sharing folder

entry.title: New release for Syncthing: v1.27.6
entry.content:
Bugfixes:

  • 9498: Files spookily out of sync in 1.27.5

entry.title: New release for Syncthing: v1.27.7
entry.content:
Bugfixes:

  • 9503: lib/nat: panic: runtime error: index out of range

entry.title: New release for Syncthing: v1.27.8
entry.content:
Bugfixes:

  • 9506: gui: Favicon not working in Firefox bookmarks

Enhancements:

  • 9527: Device connection state metric

entry.title: New release for Syncthing: v1.27.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • build: Update dependencies by @calmh in https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing/pull/9565
  • gui: Use localised time in duration by @rasa in https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing/pull/9552
  • gui: Add Filipino (fil) translation template by @acolomb in https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing/pull/9599

Full Changelog: https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing/compare/v1.27.8...v1.27.9
